description:
Arima Squad was the squad originally under the lead of http://anidb.net/ch70038 [Arima Kishou] himself.
During the Owl Suppression and Rushima Landing operations, it acted under the name Squad 0. It was tasked with eliminating any ghouls fleeing through the underground tunnels and defeating the Non-Killing Owl in case it penetrated from underground. The squad made its first appearance before the final battle against the One-Eyed Owl during the conclusion of the Owl Suppression operation. The squad would later appear during the Auction Sweep operation as part of the S3 Squad.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Arima-han
